infos.value: ...This is the vault, huh?
You have been warned. Those who disrupt the balance shall be shown no mercy.
I'm pretty sure I warned you, too.
I told you what would happen if you keep meddling in my affairs!
Show yourself, Gilgamesh!
I cannot bestow the Crystals upon you.
Well, well. Saddling up with Sadali, are you?
I do not take sides in this earthly struggle of yours.
Ready, men!
Fire!!
You fail to understand. Your guns can do nothing to—
No, you're the one who fails to understand, Gilgamesh.
But I can't give myself all the credit.
...What!?
Th-this is... Why is Veritas of the Light...!?
Farewell, Gilgamesh. Now you're just a chapter of my great story.
...Agh!
Woaaahhh! Did you see what he did to Gilgamesh!?
Pretending to go after the Crystals so that he could trick Gilgamesh into revealing himself! What a ruse!
That fool has butted in on my Crystal-gathering operations far too many times.
Haha! King Jayden knows how to get what he wants!
Gilgamesh lives yet.
Find him. Whoever puts a sword through his heart will get whatever reward they desire!
Hurry!
